mapper.select: select b.id,b.title,b.update_time,b.recommend,b.published,b.type_id,t.id,t.name from t_blog b left outer join t_type t on b.type_id = t.id order by b.update_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_blog (id,title, content, first_picture, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentabled, published, recommend, create_time, update_time, type_id, user_id, description) values (#{id},#{title},#{content},#{firstPicture},#{flag},#{views},#{appreciation}, #{shareStatement},#{commentabled},#{published},#{recommend},#{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{type.id},#{user.id},#{description});
mapper.select: select b.* ,t.id as id1,t.name, u.id as id2,u.avatar,u.nickname, u.email from t_blog b left outer join t_type t on b.type_id = t.id join t_user u on b.user_id=u.id where b.id=#{id};
mapper.update:
